title: NewsBreak: Consumer Stocks, Lululemon, Apple Pull S&PSlightly Higher
text:
NewsBreak: Consumer Stocks, Lululemon, Apple Pull S&PSlightly Higher

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 20:54)

© Reuters. Investing.com – Stocks were up modestly in mid-afternoon trading thanks to strength in consumer stocks and Apple (NASDAQ: ) - At 2:40 PM ET (18:40 GMT), the was up 0.1%. The had added 0.2%, and the was up 0.1%. The rebound came after an opening slump for U.S. stocks that saw the Dow fall as many as 104 point on U.S.- China trade jitters. - Athletic apparel maker Lululemon Athletica (NASDAQ: ) was a top stock after an upgrade. Rival Nike (NYSE: ) also was higher. Apple (NASDAQ: ), up 0.8%, was giving a boost to the and the indexes. Procter & Gamble (NYSE: ) hit a new high.

NewsBreak: Consumer Stocks, Lululemon, Apple Pull S&PSlightly Higher
description: NewsBreak: Consumer Stocks, Lululemon, Apple Pull S&PSlightly Higher
